src:
Yannie Kim Perkenalkan Makanan Indonesia ke Artis Korea, Ini Komentarnya
01 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Riska Fitria - detikFood


Foto: youtube Yannie Kim

Jakarta - Berkarir di Korea, Yannie Kim memperkenalkan makanan Indonesia. Seperti tempe goreng, rujak dan es campur ke artis Korea, Kim Jung Min saat syuting bersama.Yannie Kim adalah wanita asal Bekasi yang kini populer di Korea dengan membintangi beberapa drama Korea, seperti Hospital Ship, Yong Pali, Voice 3, Stranger from Hell dan masih banyak lagi. Dalam kesempatan saat syuting bersama Kim Jung Min untuk program youtube, Yannie kim mengajukan persyaratan kepada tim produksi."Saat mereka mengundang aku, aku minta persyaratan aku mau memperkenalkan makanan Indonesia di acara tersebut," ujar Yannie Kim melalui vlognya.


Foto: youtube Yannie Kim

Makanan Indonesia yang akan diperkenalkan oleh Yannie Kim adalah tempe goreng, rujak dan es campur. Melalui video youtube yang diunggah pada (28/10), Yannie Kim membagikan momen ketika dirinya mempersiapkan ketiga makanan Indonesia tersebut.Menurut Yannie Kim, untuk pembuatan es campur di Korea terbilang mudah karena bahan-bahannya mudah didapatkan, walaupun tidak sama persis. Ia mulai menyiapkan seperti buah kaleng, susu cair, alpukat, coconut jelly, dan sirup.Sementara untuk pembuatan tempe goreng, Yannie Kim juga menyiapkan tempe, tepung dan bumbu-bumbu. Semua bahan tersebut dibuat sendiri oleh Yannie Kim di dapur rumahnya.


Foto: youtube Yannie Kim

Baca Juga : Im Jin-ah, Artis Korea Cantik yang Jago Bikin Kimchi Dalam videonya tersebut ia juga menceritakan alasan dirinya memilih tempe goreng dan es campur untuk diperkenalkan. Itu lantaran kedua makanan Indonesia itu sangat jarang dipromokan oleh youtuber lainnya.Saat dicoba oleh aktris Korea Kim Jung Min, ketiga makanan tersebut mendapat komentar yang baik. Kim Jung Min yang juga dikenal sebagai beauty ikon di Korea mengatakan bahwa bahwa rasanya enak."Es campur Indonesia rasanya unik karena ada campuran alpukatnya. Kalau es campur di Korea ada gak ya yang pakai alpukat," ujar Kim Jung Min.


Foto: youtube Yannie Kim

Kemudian saat mencoba tempe goreng, Kim Jung Min mengatakan bahwa tempa mirip seperti meju atau sejenis kacang kedelai yang berasal dari Korea. Namun, ada hal lucu yang diungkap oleh Kim Jung Min saat melihat tampilan dari tempe yang belum diolah."Di Korea bentuk kaya gini disebut batu bata,".Sementara saat mencoba sambal terasi untuk bumbu rujak, Kim Jung Min menyebut bahwa rasanya mirip seperti gochujang atau pasta cabai khas Korea. Namun, Kim Jung Min mengatakan ketiga makanan Indonesia yang dibawa oleh Yannie Kim terasa enak dan lezat.Baca Juga : Kocak! Begini Ekspresi YouTuber Korea Cicip Lele Goreng Pertama Kali Simak Video "Melihat Aneka Produk Makanan Hasil Petani Lokal"[Gambas:Video 20detik](raf/odi)
text:
Yannie Kim Introduces Indonesian Food to Korean Artists, Here's Her Comment
01 Nov 2019, 11:20 by Riska Fitria - detikFood


Photo: Yannie Kim's youtube

Jakarta - Career in Korea, Yannie Kim introduced Indonesian food. Like fried tempeh, salad and mixed ice to Korean artists, Kim Jung Min when filming together. Yannie Kim is a woman from Bekasi who is now popular in Korea by starring in several Korean dramas, such as Hospital Ship, Yong Pali, Voice 3, Stranger from Hell and many more. On the occasion when filming with Kim Jung Min for the YouTube program, Yannie Kim submitted the requirements to the production team. "When they invited me, I asked for a requirement I want to introduce Indonesian food at the event," Yannie Kim said through her vlog.


Photo: Yannie Kim's youtube

Indonesian food that will be introduced by Yannie Kim is fried tempeh, salad and mixed ice. Through a youtube video uploaded on (28/10), Yannie Kim shared the moment when she prepared the three Indonesian foods. According to Yannie Kim, mixing mixed ice in Korea is easy because the ingredients are easy to get, although not exactly the same. He began to prepare such as canned fruit, liquid milk, avocado, coconut jelly, and syrup. While for the manufacture of fried tempe, Yannie Kim also prepared tempeh, flour and spices. All of these ingredients were made by Yannie Kim in her kitchen.


Photo: Yannie Kim's youtube

Also Read: Im Jin-ah, Beautiful Korean Artist who Is Good at Making Kimchi In the video he also tells the reason he chose fried tempe and mixed ice to introduce. That's because these two Indonesian foods are very rarely promoted by other YouTubers. When tried by Korean actress Kim Jung Min, all three foods received good comments. Kim Jung Min, also known as the beauty icon in Korea, said that it tastes good. "Indonesian mixed ice tastes unique because there is a mixture of avocados. If there is mixed ice in Korea, you use avocados," Kim Jung Min said.


Photo: Yannie Kim's youtube

Then when trying fried tempe, Kim Jung Min said that forging was similar to meju or a type of soybean originating from Korea. However, there is a funny thing that was revealed by Kim Jung Min when he saw the appearance of tempeh that has not been processed. or Korean chili paste. However, Kim Jung Min said the three Indonesian foods brought by Yannie Kim tasted good and delicious. Also Read: Hilarious! Here's the Expression of Korean YouTuber Fried Catfish Tasting First Watch Video "Seeing Various Food Products Produced by Local Farmers" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (raf / odi)
